public static Class<?> loadClassByPath(String[] paths, String className) throws Exception {

        // 1. å°†è·¯å¾„è½¬æ¢ä¸º URL å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆé€‚é…ä¸åŒæ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿï¼‰
